bibl.title: New Fragments of the Misoumenos of Menander.

series.title: University of London. Institute of Classical Studies. Bulletin Supplement No.

bibl.note: Codex de la fin du IIIe ou, plus probablement, du début du IVe siècle.
bibl.seg: Turner Eric G., New Fragments of the Misoumenos of Menander. (University of London. Institute of Classical Studies. Bulletin Supplement No. 17.)
London, Institute of Classical Studies, 1965, 4°, [v]-73 pp. et 9 pll.
Codex de la fin du IIIe ou, plus probablement, du début du IVe siècle.

C.R. par Colin Austin, CR N.S., 16 (1966) pp. 294-298. - Jean Bingen, ChrEg 41 (1966) No. 82, pp. 395-397. - Alain Blanchard, RPhil 3e s., 40 (1966) pp. 325-326. - J.C. Kamerbeek, Mnemosyne 4e s., 19 (1966) pp. 298-300. - Carlo Gallavotti, RivFil 3a s., 94 (1966) pp. 88-91. - Orsolina Montevecchi, Aegyptus 45 (1965) pp. 97-98. - Alain Blanchard, REG 79 (1966) pp. 537-539. - François Lasserre, AntCl 35 (1966) pp. 280-282. - R.B. Lloyd, CW 61 (1968) p. 302. - Hans Joachim Mette, GGA 219 (1967) pp. 20-23. - Quintino Cataudella, SicGymn N.S., 20 (1967) pp. 294-295.
